name: False Skies [demo]
description:
Communications are down, your initiation has been cut short, the wilds are filled with beasts driven to unnatural levels of aggression, and there's a pervasive feeling that *something* is about to happen. But what, exactly, is going to happen? Who is behind all this?

______

False Skies is a fairly traditional RPG, with GBC stylings.

Features:

Assemble a team of your choosing! Want a party entirely of healers? I'm not stopping you.

Team not feeling up to par? Swap out party members, or upgrade ones that have reached a high enough level!

No equipment restrictions! Give your mage a sword [but don't expect them to be any good at using it!]

______

This is a demo, albeit a fairly substantial one. It should take you a few hours to clear, though, especially if you're taking your time.
